sourceMeaningMnemonic: This <radical>net</radical> is for <radical>someone</radical> who works in a <kanji>government office</kanji>. You'll also take someone from a <kanji>political office</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Doesn't matter who, but you're going to catch someone from a government office using this net, it doesn't matter who.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Government office</kanji> and <kanji>political office</kanji> people put on the best <reading>show</reading>s (<ja>しょ</ja>). That's why you want to capture someone from there with your net.
readingInfo: Imagine the show they put on. You'll call your show "Exactly 8 Hours of Bureaucracy."
